data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Bắc Giang, Vietnam to the gospel today.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bắc Giang, Vietnam

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Bắc Giang, Vietnam into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Bắc Giang, Vietnam.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Bắc Giang against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Giay people might believe through him.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Bắc Giang, Vietnam.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Bắc Giang, Vietnam a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: the state of Bắc Giang has (about) 35,221 people who know Jesus, 130,618 people who know about him culturally, and 1,462,561 people who are far from Jesus.
